title: Morning After Lovers - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beasts   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   R-18
author: Hoshi Kanata   星彼方
description:
The morning after I had drunk too much because I broke up with my boyfriend, I woke up in a strange room in a strange bed with a strange man – naked. I ran off before he could wake up, but I forgot to take my expensive new shoes with me!

(Note: the manga and LN versions have a different name to the WN)>
